steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp_snps"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G \
    -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T VariantFiltration \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V raw_snps.vcf \
    --filterExpression "QD < 2.0 || FS > 60.0 || MQ < 40.0 || MQRankSum < -12.5 || ReadPosRankSum < -8.0" \
    --filterName "my_snp_filter" \
    -o Combined_snps_filt.vcf
steps.title: SNPfiltering

steps.commandline:
TMP="tmp_indels"
java -Djava.io.tmpdir=$TMP -Xmx32G \
    -jar $GATK_HOME/GenomeAnalysisTK.jar \
    -T VariantFiltration \
    -R $REFERENCE \
    -V raw_indels.vcf \
    --filterExpression "QD < 2.0 || FS > 200.0 || ReadPosRankSum < -20.0 || InbreedingCoeff < -0.8 || SOR > 10" \
    --filterName "my_snp_filter" \
    -o Combined_indels_filt.vcf
steps.title: INDELSfiltering

steps.commandline:
>dedupAdd.txt

for EXPERIMENT in `cat experiments`
do
    readlink -f $EXPERIMENT/$EXPERIMENT.dedupAdd.bam >> dedupAdd.txt
done
steps.title: PrepareBcftoools

steps.commandline:
cut -f1 $REFERENCE.fai | xargs -I {} -P 36 sh -c "samtools mpileup -g -B -C50 -m 4 -f $REFERENCE -r \"{}\" -b dedupAdd.txt | bcftools call -mv -O v -o bcf_\"{}\"_part.vcf"

>list.txt
for i in bcf_*_part.vcf; do 
    echo $(pwd)/$i >> list.txt;
done

bcftools concat -f list.txt --output bcftools_concat.g.vcf
gzip bcftools_concat.g.vcf

bcftools view bcftools_concat.g.vcf.gz -v snps > bcftools_concat_snps.g.vcf
bcftools view bcftools_concat.g.vcf.gz -v indels > bcftools_concat_indels.g.vcf
steps.title: BcfTools

steps.commandline:
cut -f1 $REFERENCE.fai | xargs -P 36 -I {} sh -c "freebayes -f $REFERENCE -r {} -C 5 -L dedupAdd.txt > part.fb.\"{}\".vcf"

>list.txt
for i in part.fb*.vcf; do 
    echo $(pwd)/$i >> list.txt;
done

bcftools concat -f list.txt --output freebayes_concat.g.vcf
gzip freebayes_concat.g.vcf
bcftools view freebayes_concat.g.vcf.gz -v snps > freebayes_concat_snps.g.vcf
bcftools view freebayes_concat.g.vcf.gz -v indels > freebayes_concat_indels.g.vcf
steps.title: Freebayes

steps.title: prepareCountMatrices

steps.commandline:
INPUT_FILE=$(realpath "$FILE_DIR/phenodata.xlsx")
CONVERTED_INPUT_FILE=$(realpath "$FILE_DIR/phenodata.converted.xlsx")
DATASET_FILE=$(realpath "$FILE_DIR/dataset.xlsx")
OUTPUT_DIR=$(realpath "degs/")
COMBINATION_FILE=$OUTPUT_DIR"subsets.txt"

COVARIATE="Stress.protocol"
COLUMNS_TO_SKIP="ids,Estrus,Age.w,Replicate,ids,Note,Stress_added_T"
SHEETS_TO_SKIP="PRJNA392171,PRJNA341670,Codici"
TO_SKIP="Estrus,Age.w,Replicate,ids,Note,Stress_added_T"
COLUMNS_2_VALUES="Time.from.stress.h,Phenotype,Treatment.2"
COLUMNS_NOT_TO_MERGE="Time.from.stress.h,Region,Phenotype,Treatment.2,Sex"

ORGANISM_NAME="Mus musculus"
ORGANISM_DB="org.Mm.eg.db"

cd $SCRIPT_DIR

virtualenv ENV
source ENV/bin/activate
pip install openpyxl

# Convert the configuration file
python3 configuration_converter.py $INPUT_FILE $CONVERTED_INPUT_FILE $DATASET_FILE $SHEETS_TO_SKIP

# Generate the configurations
python3 configurator.py $CONVERTED_INPUT_FILE $COVARIATE $COLUMNS_TO_SKIP $TO_SKIP $COLUMNS_2_VALUES $COLUMNS_NOT_TO_MERGE > $COMBINATION_FILE

# Split the phenodata into directories
python3.5 configuration_splitter.py $CONVERTED_INPUT_FILE $BASE_DIR $SHEETS_TO_SKIP

# Produce the configurations for all the bioprojects
python produce_lists_deseq2.py -n "control" -f $COMBINATION_FILE -i $BASE_DIR -o $OUTPUT_DIR -m $ORGANISM_NAME -d $ORGANISM_DB

deactivate
steps.title: produceDEGs
